dmca.title: Copyright Infringement on 70.86.231.165
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Atlanta Nagendra [mailto:nagendra.atlanta@gmail.com] 
Posted At: Sunday, July 02, 2006 2:09 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Copyright Infringement on 70.86.231.165
Subject: Copyright Infringement on 70.86.231.165


 
To Whom Ever it may concern
 
Greetings,
 
I am the copyright holder of several movie DVD's in the regional Indian
language, Kannada, and all of them carries an legal FBI warning. Since
the domain www.kannadigaru.com <http://www.kannadigaru.com/>  hosted at
ThePlanet.com {IP 70.86.231.165} has violated the US Copyright Law,
Please suspend/remove the domain and files and prevent future abuse. I
now request you to stop hosting this site until the problem is resolved
by all the parties concerned.  Your co-operation in this matter will be
highly appreciated. 
 
Please expeditiously "take down" or "block access" to the infringing
material and take appropriate action against the customer to prevent
future abuse.
 
Declaration
I the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an
authorized person to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual
property rights, said exclusive owners being named OM Creations. 
 
http://www.omcreations.us
Om creations 
3662 midvale avenue 
Apt 4 , Los Angeles 
CA 90034 
Ph : 1.3102026210 

I have a good faith belief that the items or materials listed below are
not authorized by the above intellectual property owners, their agents,
or the law and therefore infringe their rights.  
 
I further aver that the information contained in the Notice is accurate.
Joke Falls DVD
America America DVD
Preethi Prema Pranaya DVD
Nanna Preethiya Hudugi DVD
 
Truthfully,
Atlanta Nagendra
